contents.text: Pho is a fragrant beef noodle soup unique to Vietnam. The dish consists of rice noodles & a variety of meats mixed in a steamy beef broth seasoned w/ cinnamon, anise, cloves, & ginger, chopped green onions & fresh coriander finish each serving. Lime, crunchy bean sprouts, vietnamese basil, asian mint, & slices of jalapeno enhance the dish’s fresh flavor & add texture to this aromatic broth.

contents.text: Here is a quick list of some of our drink menu items

contents.name: Real Fruit Smoothies
contents.description: Our smooties are packed full of frozen fruit & blended w/ milk for a heathy & delicious breakfast or afternoon treat. Try the three berry, blue berry, or strawberry smoothie today

contents.name: Big Train Blends
contents.description: Blends are a lot like a granita. These coffee flavored icy blends are a great treat on a hot day or for when you just feel like it! Flavors are coffee, mocha, or vanilla

contents.name: Hard Icecream Milkshakes
contents.description: Espresso milk shakes are made w/ fresh espresso shots & vanilla ice cream. This is a decadent dessert that cannot be passed up! Try a classice vanilla milkshake or maybe chocolate milkshakes are your weakness. Or get creative by adding torani flavors

contents.name: Bagel & New Home Made Specialty Cream Cheese Spreads

contents.text: All of our sandwiches are made to order & can be substituted to be just the way you like it! Our classic sandwiches are just that, a classic sandwich we make on oatnut bread, cheese, deli meat, & fresh veggies. Our paninis are the best in town & shouldn't be passed up! We create these amazing sandwiches on honey bear's fresh made parmesan fococcia bread & grill them to perfection on the paninni grill! We have weekday specials to keep things exciting! Call us for a pick up order

contents.name: Van gogh - Turkey, cream cheese, cranberry & lettuce

contents.text: All sandwiches come w/ a side of potato salad, tims chips or a mixed green salad. Soup vary every day

Providing the most advanced education to our team is the foundation & culture of our. Through education, we gain success in our program by delivering only the best & latest techniques in coloring, cutting w/ shears & using a razor

contents.name: Bumble & Bumble
contents.description: For over 30 years, New York city-based bumble & bumble has revolutionized hair & hair styling by emphasizing the individual, transcending trends & launching new looks. From their shampoos, conditioners & hair therapy treatments, to styling & grooming cremes, waxes & sprays, bumble & bumble is known as one of the most influential hair companies in the industry. Top products include b&b thickening spray, styling creme & hair powders. popular from salons to celebs, fans of bumble & bumble include Kristen bell, “ugly betty” stylist mary-ann valdes, & the cast of “gossip girl”.

contents.name: Oribe
contents.description: Oribe,‎ the eponymous product line from one of the most influential hairdressers of all time, defines luxury in hair care. Combining over 30 years of styling heritage at the top of the editorial & salon worlds w/ old-world craftsmanship & cutting-edge innovation from the most sought-after beauty artisans, the oribe line delivers the highest possible levels of performance & sophistication. oribe delivers truly original formulations: Gels that condition, oils that hold, sprays that don't flake or clump, skincare-grade shampoos that prep hair for styling while protecting it from the environment, all lightly scented w/ specially commissioned French perfumes. Beautiful in function & form alike, this line is for taste-driven individuals who know that personal style – perfectly expressed through excellence – is the ultimate luxury. These are the products of the hair-obsessed.

contents.name: Sachajuan
contents.description: Salon sachajuan opened up in 1997 in stockholm by Sacha mitic & Juan Rosenlind, two highly recognized hairdressers w/ long experience of hairstyling / fashion in Sweden & abroad. In 2003 the first few sachajuan hair care products were introduced on the Swedish market. w/ immediate acclaim. What makes the sachajuan brand unique & interesting is simplicity & function in perfect harmony w/ high quality & innovation . Which also reflects in very handy yet elegantly designed packaging. The brand has shown unparalleled growth & is today a well established premium brand in the scandinavian market, one of the most competitive hair care markets in the world. The active ingredients & the technology behind the success of sachajuan professional haircare is called ocean silk technology. This is the technology where we extract valuable proteins & minerals from sea algae’s among them enteromorpha compressa & himanthalia elongata but also rhodophycea & chondrus crispus . We combine these algae ’s w/ other tailor made active ingredients to create unique results on different hair types. With this technology we create recipes that give the hair maximum shine, volume, stability & care without making the hair heavy Paula dorf cosmetics

contents.name: Paula dorf cosmetics
contents.description: Paula dorf is the creative mastermind behind Paula dorf cosmetics; a high quality collection of brushes & color cosmetics. Paula’s products are admired as the best in the business by fellow professional makeup artists, celebrities & most importantly, makeup lovers around the world. It is the ultimate tribute to Paula that industry leaders know her collection of unique products “did not exist” until Paula created them. She first envisioned many of these products while working as the lead makeup artist on album covers, music videos, & films during the 1980s & 1990s in New York city. Crafting brushes from art supply stores, her early tools included the award winning foundation brush, cheek cream brush & eye transformer brush, so unique they are patented. Paula’s designs are so phenomenal that other companies have tried to duplicate them, yet none have been able to match. Paula is famous for unique “trick” products that offer solutions to every woman’s makeup concerns, such as transformer from eye shadow to liquid liner, perfect illusion©for lips ends feathering lips, perfect illusion for eyes smoothes skin, perfect primer keeps foundation fresh, enhancer© baby eyes brightens eyes & clean-up stick erases makeup mistakes. Regardless of hair quality you will notice immediate results w/ sachajuan professional haircare.

contents.name: Evlovh
contents.description: The philosophy & inspiration behind our products comes from observing salon stylists & clients, & finding what's missing. We don’t want to redo or remake what's been done before, we want to evolve. We saw that both stylists & clients are increasingly looking for products made from healthier ingredients, but without giving up performance. We also observed a desire for simplicity, the ability to have beautiful hair without the fuss. So we set out to create products that are free from harmful ingredients, offer amazing performance, & simplify having beautiful, healthy hair. Simply put, our products are unlike any you have used before. We created styling products that perform multiple functions, reducing the need to layer multiple products. Our shampoo & conditioner will likely become your favorite, not only because of the wonderful scent or the shampoo’s luxurious lather, but mostly because of how good your hair will look & feel. We hope you enjoy the discovery.

contents.name: Dermalogica Skincare
contents.description: The moment your skin changed. Forever. When dermalogica meets skin, skin health is redefined. Dermalogica is the number one choice of skin care professionals & consumers worldwide. Why because for over 25 years, we"ve been dedicated to delivering skin health results through education, innovation, & professional recommendation, not through advertising, frilly packaging, promises of miracle cures, or overblown hype.

contents.text: At Studio Cleer we offer a full range of body hair maintenance & removal, or as we like to call it Manscaping. If your looking to tame a pesky patch of chest hair or to be baby bottom smooth from head to toe; we have you covered! Your comfort, privacy & satisfaction are of the highest priority.

Using top of the line Cirepil Hard, Cream & Strip waxes specifically formulated for removing course manly hair w/ ease & Cirepil soft & hard wax w/ tea tree oil for the women, both leave w/ silky smooth & supple skin. Topical numbing treatment to reduce discomfort is always used & at no additional charge.

This 100% natural & organic method of hair removal offers the benefits of room product application, reduced discomfort & fewer ingrown hairs. This process is less traumatic to the skin & hair follicle so your recovery time is much less. Service time is about double that of waxing, so plan accordingly! that of waxing, so plan accordingly!

My eyelash extension products are of the highest quality available. I use only synthetic eyelash extensions & formaldehyde free surgical grade medical adhesive. The synthetic material of my eyelash extensions provides a sterile & reduced allergen extension that wears more comfortably, & durably.
